verses.verse: Then Joseph<WH3130> came<WH935> and told<WH5046> Pharaoh<WH6547>, and said<WH559>, My father<WH1> and my brothers<WH251>, and their flocks<WH6629>, and their herds<WH1241>, and all that they have<WH935>, are come out of the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>; and<WH776>, behold, they are in the land of Goshen<WH1657>.
And he took<WH3947> some<WH7097> of his brothers<WH251>, even five<WH2568> men<WH582>, and presented<WH3322> them unto<WH6440> Pharaoh<WH6547>.

And Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559> unto his brothers<WH251>, What is your occupation<WH4639>? And they said<WH559> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, your servants<WH5650> are shepherds<WH7462>, both we<WH1>, and also our fathers.

They said<WH559> moreover unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, For to live<WH1481> in the land<WH776> are we come<WH935>; for your servants<WH5650> have no pasture<WH4829> for their flocks<WH6629>; for the famine<WH7458> is severe<WH3515> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>: now therefore<WH5650>, we pray you let your servants live<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>.
And Pharaoh<WH6547> spoke<WH559> unto Joseph<WH3130>, saying<WH559>, your father<WH1> and your brothers<WH251> are come unto you<WH935>

The land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> is before you<WH6440>; in the best<WH4315> of the land<WH776> make<WH3427> your father<WH1> and brothers<WH251> to live<WH3427>; in the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657> let them live<WH3427>: and if you know<WH3045> any men<WH582> of activity<WH2428> among them<WH7760>, then make them rulers<WH8269> over my cattle<WH4735>.
And Joseph<WH3130> brought in<WH935> Jacob<WH3290> his father<WH1>, and set him<WH5975> before<WH6440> Pharaoh<WH6547>: and Jacob<WH3290> blessed<WH1288> Pharaoh<WH6547>.
And Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559> unto Jacob<WH3290>, How<WH4100> old are you<WH3117>?

And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, The days<WH3117> of the years<WH8141> of my pilgrimage<WH4033> are one hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141>: few<WH4592> and evil<WH7451> have the days<WH3117> of the years<WH8141> of my life<WH2416> been<WH5381>, and have not attained unto the days<WH3117> of the years<WH8141> of the life<WH2416> of my fathers<WH1> in the days<WH3117> of their pilgrimage<WH4033>.
And Jacob<WH3290> blessed<WH1288> Pharaoh<WH6547>, and went out<WH3318> from before<WH6440> Pharaoh<WH6547>.

And Joseph<WH3130> placed<WH3427> his father<WH1> and his brothers<WH251>, and gave<WH5414> them a possession<WH272> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, in the best<WH4315> of the land<WH776>, in the land<WH776> of Rameses<WH7486>, as Pharaoh<WH6547> had commanded<WH6680>.
And Joseph<WH3130> nourished<WH3557> his father<WH1>, and his brothers<WH251>, and all his father<WH1>'s household<WH1004>, with bread<WH3899>, according<WH6310> to their families<WH2945>.

And there was no bread<WH3899> in all the land<WH776>; for the famine<WH7458> was very<WH3966> severe<WH3515>, so that the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> and all the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> fainted<WH3856> by reason<WH6440> of the famine<WH7458>.

And Joseph<WH3130> gathered up<WH3950> all the money<WH3701> that was found<WH4672> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, and in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, for the corn<WH7668> which they bought<WH7666>: and Joseph<WH3130> brought<WH935> the money<WH3701> into Pharaoh<WH6547>'s house<WH1004>.

And when money<WH3701> failed<WH8552> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, and in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, all the Egyptians<WH4714> came<WH935> unto Joseph<WH3130>, and said<WH559>, Give<WH3051> us bread<WH3899>: for why should we die<WH4191> in your presence<WH3701>? For the money fails<WH656>.
And Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559>, Give<WH3051> your cattle<WH4735>; and I will give<WH5414> you for your cattle<WH4735>, if money<WH3701> fail<WH656>.

And they brought<WH935> their cattle<WH4735> unto Joseph<WH3130>: and Joseph<WH3130> gave<WH5414> them bread<WH3899> in exchange for horses<WH5483>, and for the flocks<WH6629>, and for the cattle<WH4735> of the herds<WH1241>, and for the donkeys<WH2543>: and he fed<WH5095> them with bread<WH3899> for all their cattle<WH4735> for that year<WH8141>.

When that year<WH8141> was ended<WH8552>, they came<WH935> unto him the second<WH8145> year<WH8141>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH3582>, We will not hide it from my lord<WH113>, how that our money<WH3701> is spent<WH8552>; my lord<WH113> also has<WH413> our herds<WH4735> of cattle<WH929>; there is not anything left<WH7604> in the sight<WH6440> of my lord<WH113>, but our bodies<WH1472>, and our lands<WH127>:

therefore shall we die<WH4191> before your eyes<WH5869>, both we and our land<WH127>? buy<WH7069> us and our land<WH127> for bread<WH3899>, and we and our land<WH127> will be servants<WH5650> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>: and give<WH5414> us seed<WH2233>, that we may live<WH2421>, and not die<WH4191>, that the land<WH127> be not desolate<WH3456>.

And Joseph<WH3130> bought<WH7069> all the land<WH127> of Egypt<WH4714> for Pharaoh<WH6547>; for the Egyptians<WH4714> sold<WH4376> every man<WH376> his field<WH7704>, because the famine<WH7458> prevailed<WH2388> over them<WH776>: so the land became Pharaoh<WH6547>'s.
And as for the people<WH5971>, he removed<WH5674> them to cities<WH5892> from one end<WH7097> of the borders<WH1366> of Egypt<WH4714> even to the other end there<WH7097>.

Only the land<WH127> of the priests<WH3548> bought he<WH7069> not<WH3548>; for the priests had a portion<WH2706> assigned them of Pharaoh<WH6547>, and did eat<WH398> their portion<WH2706> which Pharaoh<WH6547> gave<WH5414> them<WH4376>: therefore they sold not their lands<WH127>.

Then Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> unto the people<WH5971>, Behold<WH7069>, I have bought you this day<WH3117> and your land<WH127> for Pharaoh<WH6547>: behold<WH1887>, here is seed<WH2233> for you<WH2232>, and you shall sow the land<WH127>.

And it shall come to pass in the increase<WH8393>, that you shall give<WH5414> the fifth<WH2549> part unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, and four<WH702> parts<WH3027> shall be your own<WH2233>, for seed of the field<WH7704>, and for your food<WH400>, and for them of your households<WH1004>, and for food<WH398> for your little ones<WH2945>.
And they said<WH559>, you have saved our lives<WH2421>: let us find<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of my lord<WH113>, and we will be Pharaoh<WH6547>'s servants<WH5650>.

And Joseph<WH3130> made<WH7760> it a law<WH2706> over the land<WH127> of Egypt<WH4714> unto this day<WH3117>, that Pharaoh<WH6547> should have the fifth<WH2569> part<WH7535>; except the land<WH127> of the priests<WH3548> only<WH6547>, which became not Pharaoh's.

And Israel<WH3478> lived<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, in the country<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>; and they had possessions<WH270> in it and grew<WH6509>, and multiplied<WH7235> exceedingly<WH3966>.

And Jacob<WH3290> lived<WH2421> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> seventeen<WH6240> years<WH8141>: so the whole age<WH2416> of Jacob<WH3290> was a hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and seven<WH7651> years<WH8141>.

And the time<WH3117> drew near<WH7126> that Israel<WH3478> must die<WH4191>: and he called<WH7121> his son<WH1121> Joseph<WH3130>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH4672>, If now I have found grace<WH2580> in your sight<WH5869>, put<WH7760>, I pray you your hand<WH3027> under my thigh<WH3409>, and deal<WH6213> kindly<WH2617> and truly<WH571> with me<WH6912>; bury me not<WH4714>, I pray you in Egypt:

But I will lie<WH7901> with my fathers<WH1>, and you shall carry<WH5375> me out of Egypt<WH4714>, and bury<WH6912> me in their buryingplace<WH6900>. And he said<WH559>, I will do<WH6213> as you have said<WH1697>.
And he said<WH559>, Swear<WH7650> unto me<WH7650>. And he swore unto him<WH3478>. And Israel bowed<WH7812> himself upon the bed<WH4296>'s head<WH7218>.
